subject: All Star Games
Basketball
Television
lead_paragraph: The N.B.A. All-Star Game on Sunday attracted an average of 9.1 million viewers on TNT, up 33 percent from 6.9 million last year, according to Nielsen.
snippet: The N.B.A. All-Star Game on Sunday attracted an average of 9.1 million viewers on TNT, up 33 percent from 6.9 million last year, according to Nielsen.
